name: Timer & stopwatch
description: Multiple timer & stopwatch. Supports several timer & stopwatch adding, editing and deleting.   Timer - You can add several timers and play it each other. - Stay on top of all other apps. - Timer is going to run after setting the time and press the start button. - When the time expires, a vibration alerts.   Stopwatch - You can add several stopwatches and play it each other. - Stay on top of all other apps. - Provides the functions such as start, stop, reset.   Keywords timer, stopwatch
